channel.title: Emacs on Eric Kaschalk
channel.description: Recent content in Emacs on Eric Kaschalk

item.title: Mathematical Notation in Emacs
item.description: Sequences of characters are represented as a single token using: Pretty-mode Pretty-mode provides Greeks, subscripts, and more symbols. Prettify-symbols-mode Prettify Symbols ships with Emacs as of 24.4 and adds support for custom Unicode replacement of symbols. Ligatures Unicode replacements of common operators (see Fira Code, the font I use, and Pragmata Pro fonts) Any combination of these tools may be chosen; Fira Code is not required to utilize prettify-symbols or pretty-mode.
